column5: Yes. I think I'm kinda addicted to being flirty, I tell ppl it's a joke but deep down I like knowing I'm desired. I think it's all the trauma bc of rejection that somehow makes me want to be wanted by everyone lol.

I see u have signed in the picture, I realized later lol! I'm not posting anywhere, just using as my discord pfp, I've been looking for a red album cover fanart for aaaaages! It's very pretty! ❤️ U can message me ur tumblr, I'll follow u. I'm not active there but yeah I'll reblog if u post there too :)
I loved it! Is it ok to use it? I can add your username if you want.
I threw away a sippy cup because I turned 11 and my mom told me to do so. Still keep my cloth doll tho. Be yourself, age is just a number.
I don't know anyone in my city tho! And I think my bf is dealing better with my needs :) thanks again for advice!
Why do I suddenly want some pixels to fuck me
I'm sorry for your loss. Sending you hugs.
Yeah I hope he gets more comfortable with the idea with time. Thanks for sharing your story! ❤️
Downvote, too accurate (jk, I didn't downvote)

Thank you! It's very hard not to rush things bc I feel rejected and it makes me so sad... :(

But I'll try to be patient, I love my bf very much.

*hugs back*

I usually enter littlespace when he's working, but sometimes he's here and I want to use my paci and he says it's lame ):

Thanks for replying <3
